alert.note: Alert for Aitkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 12 at 2:42PM CDT until May 12 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN AITKIN AND EASTERN CROW WING COUNTIES... At 238 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles north of Aitkin, or 22 miles north of Mille Lacs Lake, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Big Sandy Lake, Palisade, Libby, Waukenabo, Bain, White Elk Lake, Esquagamah Lake, Waldeck, and Savanna Portage State Park. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
